igdectk.common package¶

Submodules¶

igdectk.common.apphelpers module¶

Application startup process around django.apps.AppConfig.

class igdectk.common.apphelpers.ApplicationMain(app_name, app_module)[source]¶

Bases: django.apps.config.AppConfig

Advanced Django AppConfig.

It looks for a module appsettings into the application folder.

Some globals variables into appsettings are looked for :

Parameters:name (str) – Application short name

See also

igdectk.appsettings.APP_VERBOSE_NAME
A string containing the tong name of the application. Application short name is used if not founds.
igdectk.appsettings.APP_DB_DEFAULT_SETTINGS
A dict containing default settings to put into the settings table of the application. An empty dict if used if not founds.
igdectk.appsettings.APP_SETTINGS_MODEL
Object containing default settings table name or None. ‘<appname>_settings’ is used if not founds.
igdectk.appsettings.HTTP_TEMPLATE_STRING
Compoundable string (containing a %s parameters) to build the path of the HTTP error pages (40x, 50x) template. ‘<appname>/%s.html’ is used if not founds.
igdectk.appsettings.APP_VERSION
Application version as list. (0, 1) is defined if not founds.
get_setting(param_name)[source]¶

Get a setting value for this application or None if not exists.

Parameters:param_name (str) – Name of the settings parameters key
Returns:Returns the asked value or None if not founds.
Return type:any

See also

igdectk.helpers.get_setting(): to get settings from another application.

ready()[source]¶

Called by Django application manager when the application is loaded.

igdectk.common.apphelpers.get_app_db_settings(app_short_name)[source]¶

It will look for the settings.APPLICATIONS dict that contains specifics parameters for each application. Each entry use the short name of the application.

This settings are used to fill the database settings table for an application. Once the value exists into the database this is the database value that is taken en priority.

Normaly should be reserved for internal usage only.

Parameters:app_short_name (str) – Short name of the application to get the settings dict.
Returns:The application settings to store into the database, or None if there is no settings for the application at settings level.
Return type:dict
igdectk.common.apphelpers.startup(appconfig, logger)[source]¶

Helper function called by ApplicationMain on ready.

It validates the settings for a specific application. If a setting is not found into the settings table of the application, the value entry is inserted.

Later any other generic application startup processing will goes here.

igdectk.common.evaluator module¶

Python expression safe evaluator, supporting basic mathematics and booleans operators.

igdectk.common.evaluator.eval_expr(expr)[source]¶

Evaluate a Python expression safely. Support unaries and binaries operators, string, numeric, tuple, list, dict, set.

Parameters:expr (str) – Literal expression to Evaluate
Raises TypeError:
 If a type of the expression is not supported or the expression contains an error.
Returns:According to the expression, return an object of its type.
Return type:any
